roleset.name: call on the phone, again

example.name: All args
example.text: For a while , high - cost pornography lines and services that tempt children to dial -LRB- and redial -RRB- movie or music information earned the service a somewhat sleazy image , but new legal restrictions are aimed at trimming excesses .

roleset.note: REDIAL-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to dial (from redial.01-v)
